page.title: 08Tourism - continued
page.content: The apartments are named after lakes in the Lake District.The wide range of caravans all have modern facilities. The first bar was known as{"The Cabin" Now there is a large entertainments centre called{"The Sunset Inn". }Where the car park stands was once the site of a 19th century private school. The Park has recently received the {Rose {Award}of the{English Tourist Board. The{Solway Lido} was started in 1963 and it is one of the largest holiday centres in this area. It is situated on the edge of the former airfield. It has a total area of 135 acres, and has approximately 400 static caravans and 71 chalets. The touring area can take in 600 units,either tents or caravans. It has two clubs, The{"Tipple Inn"}and the{"Lido Centre",}with weekly talent, pool, domino,table-tennis competitions for the patrons. { Cont'd.
